contactMessage.introText: You have received a new message from the contact form on your website:
contactMessage.footerText: This email was sent from the contact form on your website. Use the button above to reply to the sender, or reply directly to {email}.

newsletterConfirmation.paragraph1: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter. To stay up to date with the latest developments and exclusive content, you need to confirm your subscription.
newsletterConfirmation.footerNote: If you did not make this request, you can disregard this email. You can unsubscribe at any time.
